post.body: tweetie has prefs to get rid of clouds... go to settings (iPhone settings app)

this is just regular chiropractic visit. I'm taking echinacea/goldenseal and vitamin c for the cold :)

so far, so very good. I saw an interview w/ @gladwell and that convinced me to read the book.
